    var hasLoggedConversion = function(token) {
      if (token) {
        return document.cookie.indexOf('loggedConversion=' + token) !== -1;
      }
      return false;
    }

              </div>
            </splide-carousel>
          </div><div class="drawer__footer"><!-- Start blocks -->

</cart-drawer>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    function isIE() {
      const ua = window.navigator.userAgent;
      const msie = ua.indexOf('MSIE ');
      const trident = ua.indexOf('Trident/');

      return msie > 0 || trident > 0;
    }

    if (!isIE()) return;
    const cartSubmitInput = document.createElement('input');
    cartSubmitInput.setAttribute('name', 'checkout');
    cartSubmitInput.setAttribute('type', 'hidden');
    document.querySelector('#cart').appendChild(cartSubmitInput);
    document.querySelector('#checkout').addEventListener('click', function (event) {
      document.querySelector('#cart').submit();
    });
  });
</script>

<script>
  function initRecharge() {
    const appIdWhiteList = ['294517', '6740180993', null];
    const shopifySellingPlanGroups = [];
    const sellingPlanGroups = shopifySellingPlanGroups.filter(sp => appIdWhiteList.includes(sp.app_id));
    const sellingPlanGroupDiscounts = sellingPlanGroups.flatMap(plan => plan.selling_plans).reduce((obj, sellingPlan) => {
      obj[sellingPlan.id] = { 
        discountType: sellingPlan.price_adjustments[0]?.value_type,
        discountValue: sellingPlan.price_adjustments[0]?.value,
      }
      return obj
    }, {});
    
    window.Recharge.init({
      shop: {
        selectedCurrency: "USD",
        defaultCurrency: "USD",
        identifier: "violettefr-store.myshopify.com",
      },
      element: document.getElementById('RechargeWidget_7998066557117'),
      product: {
        id: 7998066557117,
        initialVariantId: 45006832861373,
        initialSellingPlanId: null,
        sellingPlanGroups,
        available: true,
        formattedVariantPrices: {
          
            
              
        }
      }
    });
  }
  if(window.Recharge){
    initRecharge();
  } else {
    onRechargeLoad = initRecharge;
  }
</script>

<div id="product-informations" class="color-background-1 gradient section-separator">
    <div id="section-2-template" class="collapsible-content product-content collapsible-none-layout isolate content-container content-container--full-width">
      <div class="collapsible-content__wrapper page-width-desktop section-template--16154294059197__product-content-padding"><div class="grid grid--1-col collapsible-content__grid small-container">
          <div class="grid__item"><div class="details-and-ingredients accordion product-content__accordion" id="Details-template--16154294059197__product-content" data-replace="Details">
    <details id="Details-details-template--16154294059197__product-content" class="page-width-mobile" open="">
      <summary id="Summary-details-template--16154294059197__product-content" role="button" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="CollapsibleAccordion-details-template--16154294059197__product-content">
        <h3 class="accordion__title inline-richtext">
          Details
        </h3><svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">
  <path d="M1.5 1.5L5.75 6.5L10 1.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
</svg>

</summary>
      <div class="accordion__content product-content__content" id="CollapsibleAccordion-details-template--16154294059197__product-content" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-details-template--16154294059197__product-content">
        <div class="rte"><p><strong>Bêtise</strong> [bae-teaz] – A rich, indulgent warm berry shade borrowed from Bisou Balm, named for a traditional French candy.</p><p>Lip Nectar is a high-shine, ultra-hydrating, high-performance stain that’s never sticky or drying. The innovative oil-in-water emulsion blends the rich pigment of a stain with nourishing ingredients like squalane, shea butter, ceramides, and hyaluronic acid, creating moisture-locking color that lasts. Inspired by nature—each shade blooms into its richest color just after application, with hues drawn from nectar-rich flowers for an indulgent, glossy finish and a buildable, long-lasting stain.</p><p><strong>Violette’s Inspiration:</strong> “The idea for Lip Nectar came to me when I couldn’t find a truly ‘grown-up’ lip stain. I wanted to create a product that was high-performance while being deeply nourishing and comfortable to apply and wear. My vision was for it to feel indulgent and sensual, like jam—rich in texture, with a luxurious burst of color, the perfect amount of shine, and just the right stain, all without the stickiness.”</p><p>0.12oz / 3.5g</p></div>
      </div>
    </details>
  </div><div class="recommended-use accordion product-content__accordion" id="Recommended-Use-template--16154294059197__product-content" data-replace="Recommended-Use">
    <details id="Details-recommended-use-template--16154294059197__product-content" class="page-width-mobile">
      <summary id="Summary-recommended-use-template--16154294059197__product-content" role="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="CollapsibleAccordion-recommended-use-template--16154294059197__product-content">
        <h3 class="accordion__title inline-richtext">
          Recommended use
        </h3>
        <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">
  <path d="M1.5 1.5L5.75 6.5L10 1.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
</svg>

      </summary>
      <div class="accordion__content product-content__content" id="CollapsibleAccordion-recommended-use-template--16154294059197__product-content" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-recommended-use-template--16154294059197__product-content">
        <div class="rte"><p>Begin by applying Lip Nectar to the bottom lip, using the applicator to trace along your natural volume for a fuller, plumper look. Sweep across the top lip, then let the color bloom for up to two minutes as it sets into a rich, radiant stain. For more intensity, layer additional coats and watch the pigment deepen with every swipe.</p></div>
      </div>
    </details>
  </div><div class="details-and-ingredients accordion product-content__accordion" id="Ingredient-template--16154294059197__product-content" data-replace="Ingredient">
    <details id="Details-ingredients-template--16154294059197__product-content" class="page-width-mobile">

          Ingredients
        </h3>
        <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">

</svg>

      </summary>
      <div class="accordion__content product-content__content" id="CollapsibleAccordion-ingredients-template--16154294059197__product-content" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-ingredients-template--16154294059197__product-content">
        <div class="rte"><p>Aqua (Water), Diphenyl Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Ceteareth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ammonium Polyacrylate, Ceramide Np, Phytosphingosine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Vanillin. May Contain (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 6 (Ci 15985), Red 33 (Ci 17200), Blue 1 (Ci 42090), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Red 28 (Ci 45410).</p></div>
      </div>
    </details>
  </div><div class="accordion product-content__accordion" id="How-To-Use-template--16154294059197__product-content" data-replace="How-To-Use">
    <details id="Details-how-to-use-template--16154294059197__product-content">

        <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">

      </summary>
      <div class="accordion__content product-content__content" id="CollapsibleAccordion-how-to-use-template--16154294059197__product-content" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-how-to-use-template--16154294059197__product-content">
        <div class="how-to-use"><div class="how-to-use__panel">
              <htu-component class="how-to-use__container splide splide--slide splide--ltr splide--draggable is-active is-overflow is-initialized" splide-config="{

people ask</div>

                  <summary id="Summary-1-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="button" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="CollapsibleAccordion-1-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <h3 class="accordion__title inline-richtext subtitle--medium subtitle--regular-font">
                      How Long does Lip Nectar’s stain last?
                    </h3>
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">
  <path d="M1.5 1.5L5.75 6.5L10 1.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
</svg>

                  </summary>
                  <div class="accordion__content rte" id="CollapsibleAccordion-1-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-1-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <div class="rte"><p>Lip Nectar leaves a lasting stain that wears beautifully for hours—without drying out your lips. While wear time can vary based on your natural lip tone and habits, its nourishing formula is designed to deliver rich color that lingers long after the initial shine.</p></div>
                  </div>
                </details>
              </div><div class="accordion">
                <details id="Details-2-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                  <summary id="Summary-2-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="CollapsibleAccordion-2-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <h3 class="accordion__title inline-richtext subtitle--medium subtitle--regular-font">
                      How do I prep my lips for Lip Nectar?
                    </h3>
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">
  <path d="M1.5 1.5L5.75 6.5L10 1.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
</svg>

                  </summary>
                  <div class="accordion__content rte" id="CollapsibleAccordion-2-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-2-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <div class="rte"><p>No prep needed—Lip Nectar is deeply hydrating and smooths lips on its own. If your lips are feeling extra dry, you can layer a bit of balm underneath for added comfort.</p></div>
                  </div>
                </details>
              </div><div class="accordion">
                <details id="Details-3-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                  <summary id="Summary-3-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="CollapsibleAccordion-3-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <h3 class="accordion__title inline-richtext subtitle--medium subtitle--regular-font">
                      Is Lip Nectar sticky or drying?
                    </h3>
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">
  <path d="M1.5 1.5L5.75 6.5L10 1.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
</svg>

                  </summary>
                  <div class="accordion__content rte" id="CollapsibleAccordion-3-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-3-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <div class="rte"><p>Not at all. Lip Nectar delivers high-shine color with a nourishing, cushiony feel—no stickiness, no dryness. Its unique water-in-oil emulsion keeps lips smooth, hydrated, and comfortable all day.</p></div>
                  </div>
                </details>
              </div><div class="accordion">
                <details id="Details-4-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                  <summary id="Summary-4-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="CollapsibleAccordion-4-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <h3 class="accordion__title inline-richtext subtitle--medium subtitle--regular-font">
                      Can I wear Lip Nectar with other lip products?
                    </h3>
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">
  <path d="M1.5 1.5L5.75 6.5L10 1.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
</svg>

                  </summary>
                  <div class="accordion__content rte" id="CollapsibleAccordion-4-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-4-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <div class="rte"><p>Absolutely. Lip Nectar layers beautifully with liners and pairs effortlessly with balm—under or over. Wear it solo for a rich stain or mix and match to create your own custom look.</p></div>
                  </div>
                </details>
              </div><div class="accordion">
                <details id="Details-5-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                  <summary id="Summary-5-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="CollapsibleAccordion-5-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <h3 class="accordion__title inline-richtext subtitle--medium subtitle--regular-font">
                      Any tips or tricks for applying Lip Nectar?
                    </h3>
                    <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" class="icon icon-caret" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 11 8">
  <path d="M1.5 1.5L5.75 6.5L10 1.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="square"></path>
</svg>

                  </summary>
                  <div class="accordion__content rte" id="CollapsibleAccordion-5-template--16154294059197__product-faq" role="region" aria-labelledby="Summary-5-template--16154294059197__product-faq">
                    <div class="rte"><p><strong>Try an Ombré Lip: </strong>Define the edges of your lips with Dahlia Noir, then swipe Bêtise in the center. Soft, dimensional, and striking.</p><p><strong>Contour with Color: </strong>Outline the volume of your lips with Dahlia Noir and brighten the center with Rose de Moab. Fair skin? Outline with Rose de Moab, and swipe Bêtise in the center.</p><p><strong>Go Deep: </strong>For a bolder stain, layer slowly—blot between coats and reapply to build intensity.</p></div>
                  </div>
                </details>
              </div></div>
        </div>

      "@context": "http://schema.org/",

Outline with Rose de Moab, and swipe Bêtise in the center.\nGo Deep: For a bolder stain, layer slowly—blot between coats and reapply to build intensity."

      <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="tr" aria-label="Close"></button>
    </td>
  </tr>
</template>
